name: Flips - Garden
description:
Flips are connecting you to this planet. Every step resembles the nature affected by our carbon footprint. 

Flips are made from recyclable EVA rubbers. No rubber trees are harmed in our manufacturing process. 

With its flat-packing, Flips save space, weight, packaging and shipping carton in the transportations. Two rubber layers are locking together by our patented locking teeth, without using any adhesives or stitches. You can easily assembly Flips by yourself. 

Flips are also washable, then wearing them to beaches, 
mountains or on your daily life are all enjoyable with no worries about dirty.

Garden is the first model in our Flips product line. Its green and white colors are selected to reflect the touch and feeling of freshness in the garden.

Sizes : 
S     24.5 cm - 9" 5/8
M    25.5 cm - 10"
L     27.5 cm - 10" 3/4
XL   28.5 cm - 11" 1/4

name: Grows
description:
Grows are the biodegradable plant cups which is environmentally friendly. They are made from the alternative material to traditional plastic and foam. Grows are composed of Sugarcane fiber and the organic binding chemical to hold the fibers in place. 

Grows itself will be biodegraded by micro-organism in your garden and became a soil for plant. Itâ€™s designed to be naturally biodegraded only in 30-45 days. The material itself is very ecofriendly to the soil and plant while giving the very effective ways of green planting.

The concept of Grows is you could do the transplanting your plants without having to remove the plant from cup, just pop it in the planting hole whilst still in its container. It is very suitable for planting outdoors, indoors, in your gardens and plant nurseries.
